name: Lipikar Uniform Format File
summary: Learn about .LUF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Text saved in an LUF file conforms to the limitations of the text box. All text is formatted with a single font, color, style, and effect.

description: Rich text (.RTF) file saved by Lipikar, a multi-language desktop authoring tool for Windows fonts; created when the contents of the Lipikar text box are saved to a file.
